definition: Xibo ethnic group of northeast China
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Being a descent of Xibo People, archery is my passion.
sentences.chinese: 作爲錫伯族的後裔，射箭是我的熱愛。

sentences.english: Now I can compete with our Xibe friends.
sentences.chinese: 可以好好跟錫伯族的朋友們比一比。

sentences.english: Home-heritage site for the Xibo People. It is in Shenyang, Liaoning Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國遼寧瀋陽市的錫伯族家廟。

sentences.english: The cultural choice of the Xibo nationality is a historical process.
sentences.chinese: 錫伯族的文化選擇是個歷史的過程。

sentences.english: They must be of the Xibe ethnic group.
sentences.chinese: 這肯定是錫伯族的朋友。

sentences.english: This is a Xibe family genealogy.
sentences.chinese: 這個是錫伯族家中的家譜。

sentences.english: No wonder every Xibe man is good at archery.
sentences.chinese: 難怪錫伯族的人啊個個都善於拉弓射箭的。

sentences.english: How come these Xibe people were relocated from northeast China to Xinjiang?
sentences.chinese: 錫伯族怎麼會從東北遷到新疆呢？

sentences.english: Daniel, This is the famed Xibe calligrapher Mr. Ge Tuken.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，這位啊就是錫伯族著名的書法家格土肯先生。
